amendment.description: To rename the death gratuity payable for deaths of members of the Armed Forces as fallen hero compensation.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1421 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1421 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S8735-8738; text: CR S8735-8736) To rename the death gratuity payable for deaths of members of the Armed Forces as fallen hero compensation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1421 proposed by Senator Salazar.
